mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM t_role r LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (r.role_id = ur.role_id) LEFT JOIN t_user u ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) WHERE u.username = #{username}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_role r WHERE 1 = 1
AND r.role_name like CONCAT('%',#{role.roleName},'%')

SELECT r.role_id roleId, r.role_name roleName, r.remark, r.create_time createTime, r.modify_time modifyTime, GROUP_CONCAT( rm.menu_id ) menuIds FROM t_role r LEFT JOIN t_role_menu rm ON ( r.role_id = rm.role_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND r.role_name like CONCAT('%',#{role.roleName},'%')
GROUP BY r.role_id
